imdb.title: Chrono Crusade
imdb.plot: The Roaring 20's a time of prosperity. Jazz is king, the Mob rules the streets, and Demons are running a mock. Enter Sister Rosette Christopher, of the Order of Magdaline, an elite group out to destroy the evil. Along with her fai...

episodes.title: Atonement
episodes.plot: On the night of the carnival, Joshua reveals himself before Rosette. However, confused of his identity, Joshua uses his power to protect Aion.

episodes.title: Temptation
episodes.plot: Joshua and Chrono battle in the skies above San Francisco. The aftermath of this battle wrecks the town that's already in a state of chaos because of the ritual of atonement. Thanks to the powers of Duffau and Minister Remington, Sinners Genai and Shader are defeated, but Rosette falls into Aion's clutches.

episodes.title: Sayonara
episodes.plot: Rosette, who has been seen in Los Angeles, is going around and healing the injured with the power of her miracles.

episodes.title: The Covenant
episodes.plot: Elder, the mad scientist responsible for the equipment that the soldiers of the Magdalene Order use, has just invented the "Spirit," a bullet that, as the devil that is sealed inside of it begins to materialize, changes the released spiritual energy into destructive force. Rosette, who had the Spirit entrusted to her, had loaded it into her gun, but looses it during a mission!

episodes.title: Sinners
episodes.plot: While in protective custody, Azmaria gets taken away by Viscount Lerajie and Chrono is severely wounded. In order to recover Azmaria, Rosette is prepared to undo Chrono's seal, but that would take away her own life.

episodes.title: Militia
episodes.plot: Rosette, who has been prohibited to search for Joshua by Sister Kate, goes with Minister Remington's suggestion and takes the test to become a Militia. Remington secretly releases a devil for the test, but Azmaria is also in the testing area!

episodes.title: The Devil
episodes.plot: The red moon appears, the statue of Mary cries tears of blood, and as the disasters prophesized in the Bible occur, the seal on the land connected to Pandemonium is undone. In order to reseal the area, the Magdalene Order is dispatched to Central Park where the dead have returned and miasma is scattered all about.

episodes.title: Joshua
episodes.plot: Since the incident in Central Park, there has been an increase in the activities of dark ones due to Aion's influence. Taking her uneasy feelings about the battle to heart, Rosette brings Azmaria to the place where it all started, the Seventh Bell orphanage.

episodes.title: Horn
episodes.plot: Four years ago, Aion, who had learned of Chrono's awakening, appeared before Rosette and the others. Chrono refused him, but by that time, Aion had already given Chrono's horns to Joshua.

episodes.title: Holy Night
episodes.plot: While busy preparing for the Christmas service, the Magdalene Order receives clues as to the whereabouts of Joshua, the younger brother Rosette has been searching for.

episodes.title: The Pursuers
episodes.plot: Duke Duffau, the person from Satella's villa, is on the mission to pursue sinners like Chrono and Aion. Amazingly, he asks Rosette and the others to ally with him in order to defeat Aion.

episodes.title: Believer
episodes.plot: As the cooperative battle plan of Duffau and the Magdalene Order moves forward, Satella, who is against Rosette's decision to work with the devils, leaves by herself to investigate some cases of disappearances that have been occurring in the outskirts of San Francisco.

episodes.title: Accomplices
episodes.plot: Because of the shock she received during her battle with Aion, Satella is unable to regain her power as a jewel summoner. And Rosette, who is concerned about her, has blood come out of the wounds cut into her forehead and wrists...

episodes.title: Photograph/Four People
episodes.plot: The Magdalene Order has suffered quite the blow when they were beaten back by the Sinners. Now forced to rest in order to prepare for the next battle, Rosette, Chrono, and Satella are all deeply depressed and eager to regain their powers.

episodes.title: Mary Magdalene
episodes.plot: The whereabouts of Rosette, who was taken away by Aion, remain unknown. Meanwhile, the chaos in San Francisco that came about due to the ritual of atonement has spread throughout the United States. But Chrono was frozen during the battle with Joshua, and his consciousness wanders back to when he was still a Sinner and accompanying Aion.

episodes.title: The Noise
episodes.plot: Following the instructions of the letter that he was sent, Chrono goes to an abandoned church, where Aion and Rosette appear before him. Shocked by Rosette saying that she wants to cancel their contract, Chrono ends up letting Aion get away...
